DOC.brief_summary: Subjects hospitalize ICU include 24 hour intubation ICU stay . Twice-daily Neuromuscular Electrical Stimulation ( NMES ) perform one leg 2x40 min per day assess muscle fiber size . The investigator hypothesize attenuated loss muscle fiber size .
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy Neuromuscular Electrical Stimulation Attenuate Muscle Loss
DOC.criteria: Male Age 18 80 year Expected sedated time > 24h Spinal Cord Injury Arterial operaties legs Local wound prohibit NMES Chronic use corticosteroid Intake certain antithrombotic drug Presence implantable cardioverter defibrillator and/or pacemaker
